resources.string:
*** v1.11 *** 
Updated to Android SDK version 23 

*** v1.10 *** 
Default engine changed to Robbolito or Stockfish 6(Android OS 5.0). 

*** v1.9 *** 
New engine, deuterium v14.3, added. 
Elimination of Android 5.0 (Lollipop) error. 

*** v1.8 *** 
Source code released on GitHub. 
IDE: Conversion of Eclipse on Android Studio. 

*** v1.7 *** 
Source code is available from my homepage. 

*** v1.6 *** 
Translations: 
Spanish - Sergio Revinelli 
Russian - Ark (hark, arkpc) 

*** v1.5 *** 
Troubleshooting: engine access error with multiple user accounts on tablets with Android 4.2. 

Added: Option settings for playing strength (is not supported on all engines). 

New graphics design by Lars Streblow. 

*** v1.4 *** 
Troubleshooting: uninstall engines
